item.description:
Cary Harwin, President and Co-founder of FundaGeek – Crowdfunding for Technical Innovation.   www.fundageek.com This presentation will be via Skype.

Arrive as early as 6:30 to network with others. The meeting starts promptly at 7:00. A map of MIT showing the meeting location in Building 3 Room 333 is here. Street parking is suggested on Ames Street or Memorial Drive. Most MIT buildings have easy access and are interconnected. For more about the Inventors Association of New England, go to our website at www.inventne.com
item.name: Inventors Association of New England Monthly Meetup
